title: Preloader Ultimate - Premium WordPress Plugins
description:
Preloader Ultimate is a wordpress plugin that will add a beautiful animated loading screen indicator on your site. You can create unique preloading effects on each post/page. Choose the best loading spinner for your preloader from the four available option (CSS3, GIF, SVG, Custom upload). Customize the color, size and background, add some text below the loading spinner, add some awesome effects when preloader exit or when the site content is display. Contains external links.

To install:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
